system.type: Human, Psy Rating, Soul Bound Trait
system.descriptor: The Astropath's bond to the Emperor, and any benefits that come with it are destroyed, replaced with something accursed.
system.uses: Lose Soul-Bound Trait, gain Accursed Trait instead. Gain 1d10 Corruption, 1d10 Insanity, and one Malignancy of character's choice.

description.value: The Astropath's bond to the Emperor, and any benefits that come with it are destroyed, replaced with something accursed.
